I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 (Br m l) one z = cA_1 m one z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then
Br = fix Br (m : fmap) (l : list) {struct l} : fmap := match l with | lam => m | cons x x' l0 => Br (Br1 m x x') l0 end : fmap -> list -> fmap
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive list : Set := lam : list | cons : dart -> dart -> list -> list
dart = nat : Set
cA1_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA (Br m l) one z = cA m one z
exd_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (Br m l) z
inv_hmap_Br : forall (l : list) (m : fmap), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (Br m l)
cA1_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 (Br1 m x x') one z = cA_1 m one z
x_1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cA_1 m one x = cA_1 m1 one x
cF_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m one x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x') z then cA_1 m one x else cF m z)
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA (Br1 m x x') one z = cA m one z
McA1.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m Md1.k (cA m Md1.k z) = z
McA0.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m Md0.k (cA m Md0.k z) = z
not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
cF_L : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> cF (L m k x y) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 m one (if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m zero y else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec y (cA_1 m zero z) then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m one x) (cA_1 m zero z) then cA_1 m one y else cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z))
cA_1_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
cA0_1_MA0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), cA_1 m zero z = MA0.f_1 m z
cF_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF (B m k x) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 (B m zero x) one (if eq_dart_dec (A m zero x) z then top m zero x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m zero x) z then x else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec (A m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then top m one x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then x else cA_1 m one (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z))
cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z
cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
cA_1_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
cA_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
cA_1_I : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> x <> z -> cA_1 (I m x u p) k z = cA_1 m k z
y_0_1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cF m y = cA_1 m1 one (top m1 zero x)
cF_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in betweenf m x_1 z y -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec y z then x_1 else cF m z)
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
cF_L1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x = y_1
cF_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let x10 := cF_1 m x in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let m1 := L m one x y in cF m1 z = (if eq_dart_dec y0 z then x else if eq_dart_dec x10 z then y_1 else cF m z)
MF.upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.degree m z
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
cF_1_Br1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF_1 (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m one x) z then cA m zero x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m one x') z then cA m zero x else cF_1 m z)
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
cF_1_cF : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF_1 m (cF m z) = z
cF_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
cF_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA m zero (cA m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA_1_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA_1 m k1 z

``` 
intros l m z H_inv_hmap.
unfold cA_1. unfold cA_1. destruct H_inv_hmap as [H_inv_hmap _].
simpl. rewrite <- H_inv_hmap.
reflexivity.
